content: this legal text summarizes a court decision made by the district court in ljubljana on february 28 2022 the case involves three heirs who are responsible for bearing 13 of the total costs of 24300 eur the court ruled on the division of the deceased persons assets which include a real estate property subfund units funds in a personal bank account and funds owed to a leasing company each heir is entitled to a share of the assets with the widower and two sons each receiving 13 the court applied the inheritance act specifically articles 10 and 11 to determine the heirs and the value of the estate a probate hearing was held on february 28 2022 for the deceased person who did not leave a will the court determined the heirs based on the inheritance act and established the value of the estate the heirs are responsible for paying a portion of the court fees the court will issue a final judgment and register the ownership rights with the land registry the heirs can take possession of the movable property once the final order of succession is obtained and the court title is registered the text also provides instructions for lodging an appeal including the time limit submission requirements and payment of court fees the ljubljana high court will decide on the appeal the text is dated march 11 2022 in ljubljana

metadata.subject_of_succession: real estate, sub-fund units, personal bank account, funds at leasing company
metadata.relationship_between_parties: widower and sons of the deceased
